messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: If Basic Unschooling information is needed :) I ll add to Tia s post that it can be found in many places all over the internet -- the archives at
messages.messageBody:
If Basic Unschooling information is needed :) I'll add to Tia's post that it
can be found in many places all over the internet -- the archives at
www.unschooling.com are good, as are the articles at the website
www.sandradodd.com

Meanwhile, this list remains for folks who already embrace unschooling.

Best,

Pam

----------
>From: Tia Leschke <leschke@...>
>To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
>Date: Sun, Aug 24, 2003, 9:29 AM
>

>
>
>
>> yes
>> to teach and raise children, i can see how that is such a waste of time.
>> since that is what the majority of people think i teach my own.
>
> Did you read the description of this list? Do you understand what
> unschooling is? Unschoolers only very rarely use textbooks, and then only
> when their children request them.
> Tia
>
> "They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
> deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
> leschke@...

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: ... Did you read the description of this list?  Do you understand what unschooling is?  Unschoolers only very rarely use textbooks, and then only when their
messages.messageBody:
> yes
> to teach and raise children, i can see how that is such a waste of time.
> since that is what the majority of people think i teach my own.

Did you read the description of this list? Do you understand what
unschooling is? Unschoolers only very rarely use textbooks, and then only
when their children request them.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety
deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: yes to teach and raise children, i can see how that is such a waste of time. since that is what the majority of people think i teach my own. AUTISM Ten years
messages.messageBody:
yes
to teach and raise children, i can see how that is such a waste of time.
since that is what the majority of people think i teach my own.

AUTISM
Ten years ago one in 10,000
Five years ago one in 500
Today one in 150
SCARED YET?
www.momsonamissionforautism.org






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Pam Hartley [mailto: pamhartley@mindspring.com] To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, ummezahid@aol.com Date: Fri, 22 Aug 2003 18:10:52 -0700 Subject:
messages.messageBody:
--- On Fri 08/22, Pam Hartley < pamhartley@... > wrote:
From: Pam Hartley [mailto: pamhartley@...]
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, ummezahid@...
Date: Fri, 22 Aug 2003 18:10:52 -0700
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale

The list owner is out of town, but I'm going to take a wild guess here that<br>we're not a good list for advertisements in general, and for textbook<br>advertisements in particular. Please refrain unless I am corrected in<br>future.<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Pam<br>Moderator #217<br>----------<br>>From: ummezahid@...<br>>To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com,

LOL I, being the book nut that I am, got all excited and thought "oh wonder if there's anything good in there," only to find a list of text books?? what a waste of time!

Darlene

_______________________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: The list owner is out of town, but I m going to take a wild guess here that we re not a good list for advertisements in general, and for textbook
messages.messageBody:
The list owner is out of town, but I'm going to take a wild guess here that
we're not a good list for advertisements in general, and for textbook
advertisements in particular. Please refrain unless I am corrected in
future.

Thanks,

Pam
Moderator #217
----------

messages.subject: new book list for sale
messages.msgSnippet: i have an assortment ofhome schooling books for sale. if anyone is interested in this partial list please email me privately inshaallah ummezahid@aol.com hard
messages.messageBody:
i have an assortment ofhome schooling books for sale. if anyone is interested
in this partial list please email me privately inshaallah ummezahid@...

hard back where is it? ( a science book)

kids book of science

creating classroom authors

spelling workout for grades 4-6 workbook

assortment for writing and listening grades 1-2 both books

science hard back 7,8 9. hardback textbooks

eyewitness sports hardback

eyewitness first humans hardback

kids travel survival guide

the grab a pencil book of fun and games

pocket body facts

butterflys and moths

the lion and the wardrobe

seashells of the world

6th grade read aloud plays big book paperback 200 pages

6th home envolvement activities workbook

6th grammer workbook

6th vocabulary workbook

6th spelling workbook

6th grade spelling workbook

3rd grade adventuring text book and workbook

textbook of literature 6th, 7th and 8th hard back textbooks

magic tree house chapter books

a few boxcar books

childrens atlas nice hard back book

family math huge book of about 200 pages

phonics

spelling

the greeen phamacy a hard back book

1 read and yellow crayola smok plastic

1 purple velvet scrap book

the apolcolipse triolgy video set

making connections an interactive approach to academic reading

independent writing

learnig phonics and spelling in a whole language classroom

365 travel games and activities

hidden worlds a hardback from national geographic for children

gel candels hardback

the glow in the dark night sky book hardback

phonetic reader number 6 robinson crusoe

improving computational skills/ readiness

growing upp with science hardback

penguins and polar bears animals of the ice and snow hardback

readers digest how to do just about anything on a computer hard back with cd

crayola fun with gel markers how to book lots of pictures

the story of the gettysburg address hardback book

my fun with words hard back big colorful book

my fun with reading hardback big colorful book

mcgraw hill science textbook second grade

AUTISM
Ten years ago one in 10,000
Five years ago one in 500
Today one in 150
SCARED YET?
www.momsonamissionforautism.org
